eventScripts.script:
path = "[.]R_Auto_Band_Bus_V_Hi_Max"
	value = system.tag.readBlocking(path)
		
	path1 = "[.]../Auto_Band_Bus_V_Hi_Max"
	
	
	#newvalue = ((value & 0xff00) >> 16) | ((value & 0xff) << 16)
	newvalue = value / 16
	system.tag.writeBlocking(path1, newvalue)

Path = "[.]BusVoltageFeedbackOffset"
	newvalue = system.tag.readBlocking([Path])[0].value
	
	server = "Ignition OPC UA Server"
	Modbus_Id_Num = "[.]../Modbus_Id_Num"
	UDT_Name = "[.]../DCB_Num"
	path1 ="ns=1;s=[DCB"
	path2 = system.tag.readBlocking([UDT_Name])[0].value
	path3 ="]"
	path4 = system.tag.readBlocking([Modbus_Id_Num])[0].value
	path5 = ".HRUI70"
	addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3
	
	system.opc.writeValue(server,addr,newvalue)

	addr = path1 + str(path2) + path3 + str(path4) + path5
	newvalue = value*16

WritePath = "[.]../ctrl/CurrentLimitLow"
	WriteValue = system.tag.readBlocking([WritePath])[0].value
	ReadPath = "[.]../I_Lim_Lw"
	ReadValue = system.tag.readBlocking([ReadPath])[0].value


	zero = 0
	if ReadValue != WriteValue:
		if WriteValue < 0:
			WriteValue = WriteValue + 1
			system.tag.write(WritePath,WriteValue)
		else:
			WriteValue = WriteValue - 1
			system.tag.write(WritePath,WriteValue)

WritePath = "[.]../ctrl/CurrentLimitHigh"
	WriteValue = system.tag.readBlocking([WritePath])[0].value
	ReadPath = "[.]../I_Lim_HI"
	ReadValue = system.tag.readBlocking([ReadPath])[0].value


	zero = 0
	if ReadValue != WriteValue:
		if WriteValue > zero:
			WriteValue = WriteValue - 1
			system.tag.write(WritePath,WriteValue)
		else:
			WriteValue = WriteValue + 1
			system.tag.write(WritePath,WriteValue)
